data.lore: The largest and fiercest of her species, Rek'Sai is a merciless predator that tunnels through the earth to ambush and devour her prey. Her insatiable hunger has laid waste to entire regions of the once-great Shuriman empire. Merchants, traders and armed caravans will go hundreds of miles out of their way to avoid these vast areas, though cunning bandits have been known to lure the unwary into her killing grounds. Once Rek'Sai detects you, your fate is sealed. There is no hope of escape; she is death from below the sand.
data.name: Rek'Sai
data.title: the Void Burrower

spells.tooltip:
Un-Burrowed: Rek'Sai's next 3 basic attacks within 5 seconds deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus Physical Damage to nearby enemies.

Burrowed: Rek'Sai launches a burst of void-charged earth that explodes on first unit hit, dealing {{ e4 }} (+{{ a2 }}) Magic Damage and revealing non-stealthed enemies hit for {{ e6 }} seconds.
spells.description:
Rek'Sai's next 3 basic attacks deal bonus Physical Damage to nearby enemies.

While Burrowed, Rek'Sai launches a burst of void-charged earth that deals Magic Damage and reveals enemies hit.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Un-Burrowed: Rek'Sai's next 3 basic attacks within 5 seconds deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus Physical Damage to nearby enemies. Burrowed: Rek'Sai launches a burst of void-charged earth that explodes on first unit hit, dealing {{ e4 }} (+{{ a2 }}) Magic Damage and revealing non-stealthed enemies hit for {{ e6 }} seconds.
spells.name: Queen's Wrath / Prey Seeker
spells.sanitizedDescription: Rek'Sai's next 3 basic attacks deal bonus Physical Damage to nearby enemies. While Burrowed, Rek'Sai launches a burst of void-charged earth that deals Magic Damage and reveals enemies hit.

spells.tooltip:
Un-Burrowed: Burrow into the ground.

Burrowed: Un-burrow, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Physical Damage and knocking up nearby enemies for up to 1 second based on their proximity to Rek'Sai. A unit cannot be hit by Un-burrow more than once every {{ e6 }} seconds.

Burrowed Effects: New abilities, +{{ f1 }} Movement Speed, reduced vision range, disabled basic attacks, and gains Tremor Sense: Nearby enemies that move in Fog of War have their position revealed to Rek'Sai and her allies.
spells.description:
Rek'Sai burrows into the ground, gaining new abilities and increased Movement Speed. Her vision range is reduced and she cannot use basic attacks.

While Burrowed, Rek'Sai may cast Un-burrow to knock up and damage nearby enemies.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Un-Burrowed: Burrow into the ground. Burrowed: Un-burrow, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Physical Damage and knocking up nearby enemies for up to 1 second based on their proximity to Rek'Sai. A unit cannot be hit by Un-burrow more than once every {{ e6 }} seconds. Burrowed Effects: New abilities, +{{ f1 }} Movement Speed, reduced vision range, disabled basic attacks, and gains Tremor Sense: Nearby enemies that move in Fog of War have their position revealed to Rek'Sai and her allies.
spells.name: Burrow / Un-burrow
spells.sanitizedDescription: Rek'Sai burrows into the ground, gaining new abilities and increased Movement Speed. Her vision range is reduced and she cannot use basic attacks. While Burrowed, Rek'Sai may cast Un-burrow to knock up and damage nearby enemies.

spells.tooltip:
Un-Burrowed: Rek'Sai bites a target dealing {{ f1 }} Physical Damage, increasing by up to 100% at maximum Fury. If Rek'Sai has 100 Fury, Furious Bite deals True Damage.

Maximum Damage: {{ f2 }}

Burrowed: Rek'Sai tunnels forward leaving two connected Tunnel Entrances. Clicking a Tunnel Entrance will make Rek'Sai dive to the other entrance.

Tunnel Entrances last for {{ e5 }} minutes and can be destroyed by enemies. Rek'Sai may have {{ e6 }} tunnels at one time.
spells.description:
Rek'Sai bites her target, dealing increased damage based on her Fury. Deals True Damage at max Fury.

While Burrowed, Rek'Sai creates a re-usable, long lasting tunnel. Enemies can destroy it by standing on top of either entrance.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Un-Burrowed: Rek'Sai bites a target dealing {{ f1 }} Physical Damage, increasing by up to 100% at maximum Fury. If Rek'Sai has 100 Fury, Furious Bite deals True Damage. Maximum Damage: {{ f2 }} Burrowed: Rek'Sai tunnels forward leaving two connected Tunnel Entrances. Clicking a Tunnel Entrance will make Rek'Sai dive to the other entrance. Tunnel Entrances last for {{ e5 }} minutes and can be destroyed by enemies. Rek'Sai may have {{ e6 }} tunnels at one time.
spells.name: Furious Bite / Tunnel
spells.sanitizedDescription: Rek'Sai bites her target, dealing increased damage based on her Fury. Deals True Damage at max Fury. While Burrowed, Rek'Sai creates a re-usable, long lasting tunnel. Enemies can destroy it by standing on top of either entrance.

spells.tooltip:
Passive: Grants {{ e1 }}% Attack Speed.

Active: After channeling for 1.5 seconds, Rek'Sai becomes untargetable while travelling to target Tunnel Entrance. Taking damage from a champion or tower will interrupt the channel.
spells.description: Rek'Sai travels at incredible speed to a targeted Tunnel Entrance.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Passive: Grants {{ e1 }}% Attack Speed. Active: After channeling for 1.5 seconds, Rek'Sai becomes untargetable while travelling to target Tunnel Entrance. Taking damage from a champion or tower will interrupt the channel.
spells.name: Void Rush
spells.sanitizedDescription: Rek'Sai travels at incredible speed to a targeted Tunnel Entrance.

passive.name: Fury of the Xer'Sai
passive.description: While unburrowed Rek'Sai generates Fury with her basic attacks and spells. When burrowed Rek'Sai consumes Fury to heal herself.
passive.sanitizedDescription: While unburrowed Rek'Sai generates Fury with her basic attacks and spells. When burrowed Rek'Sai consumes Fury to heal herself.
